description: A large bird native to Hungry-La Island that Luffy and Toriko hunt together for food. This creature is part of the island's edible wildlife.
significance: The bird that Luffy and Toriko initially believed to be the legendary ingredient, though it was later revealed that the island itself was the true treasure.

description: Edible pig creatures encountered on Hungry-La Island that are naturally suited for barbecue.
significance: One of the food creatures on the island that demonstrates the unique edible wildlife.

description: A legendary fruit said to exist on a mountain on Hungry-La Island where the Cocoalas took Nami and Komatsu.
significance: The supposed treasure that the Cocoalas were guarding, though the true treasure was the island itself.
